comment.author: 13935339@N05
comment._content:
The "Akutan Zero," recovered virtually intact after a fatal landing accident in the Aleutians, was recovered by the Navy and taken to NAS North Island for evaluation. Its flight testing results were directly responsible for the design of Grumman's F6F "Hellcat."

It is seen here undergoing restoration at NAS North Island, following its recovery from Akutan Island.
